name: Cooperative Nature
summary: The short human life span lends perspective and has taught you from a young age to set aside differences and work with others to achieve greatness.
description:
The short human life span lends perspective and has taught you from a young age to set aside differences and work with others to achieve greatness. You gain a +4 circumstance bonus on checks to Aid.
Cooperative Nature Leads To...

Cooperative SoulTraitsHuman: A creature with this trait is a member of the human ancestry. Humans are a diverse array of people known for their adaptability. An ability with this trait can be used or selected only by humans.
